Package com.example.omrifit.adapters

Class TaskAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<TaskAdapter.ViewHolder>
com.example.omrifit.adapters.TaskAdapter
public class TaskAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<TaskAdapter.ViewHolder>
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of tasks.
